Structs/QEDModel.html#/s:6QEDSDK8QEDMode.name: persist(filesArray:)
Structs/QEDModel.html#/s:6QEDSDK8QEDMode.abstract: Will persist a given array of QEDFile instances to UserDefaults.

Structs/QEDModel.html#/s:6QEDSDK8QEDMode.name: loadFromStore()
Structs/QEDModel.html#/s:6QEDSDK8QEDMode.abstract: Returns the locally persisted array of QEDFile instances.

Structs/QEDFile/ProofStatus.html#/s:6QED.name: undefined
Structs/QEDFile/ProofStatus.html#/s:6QED.abstract: The file has not been requested for certification yet

Structs/QEDFile/ProofStatus.html#/s:6QED.name: pending
Structs/QEDFile/ProofStatus.html#/s:6QED.abstract: The report has been submited to blockchain but is not yet confirmed

Structs/QEDFile/ProofStatus.html#/s:6QED.name: init(fromAPIString:)
Structs/QEDFile/ProofStatus.html#/s:6QED.abstract: Creates a ProofStatus instance based on the string representation from QED REST API response

Structs/QEDFile/ProofStatus.html#/s:6QED.name: string
Structs/QEDFile/ProofStatus.html#/s:6QED.abstract: The string value used to represent the status on QEDAPI transactions

Structs/QEDFile/ProofStatus.html.name: ProofStatus
Structs/QEDFile/ProofStatus.html.abstract: The curernt blockchain certificate state for a QEDFile

Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.name: init(with:)
Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.abstract: Creates a QEDFile instance for a local file URL.

Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.name: init(withName:extension:dateTaken:)
Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.abstract: Creates a QEDFile instance with the provided name, ext and dateTaken.

Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.name: init(fromQEDAPIResponseDict:fileURL:)
Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.abstract: Creates a QEDFile instance from a Dictionary from API response.

Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.name: qedDirectory
Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.abstract: Default storage directory for the QEDFile content file in the app’s bundle.

Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.name: pdfDirectory
Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.abstract: Storage dictionary for the downloaded PDF files in the app bundle.

Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.name: name
Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.abstract: The name for the associated file without extension

Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.name: ext
Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.abstract: A string representing the type of file (i.e the extension).

Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.name: dateTaken
Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.abstract: The client date when the file was created.

Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.name: note
Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.abstract: An optional string with a note about the file.

Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.name: slug
Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.abstract: A unique string that identifies the reported file in the backend.

Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.name: isSynchedWithServer
Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.abstract: Indicates if the file has already been reported to the server. (i.e. if it has a slug)

Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.name: proofStatus
Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.abstract: The current status of the notarisation on the blockchain as reported by the backend.

Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.name: hash
Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.abstract: The hash to be stored on the blockchain as proof of existence of the associated file.

Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.name: withCalculatedHash()
Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.abstract: Returns a QEDFile instance with the hash calculated from the file at localFileLocation.

Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.name: fileURL
Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.abstract: The URL where the file is meant to be locally stored.

Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.name: localFileLocation
Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.abstract: The actual location url for the local file.

Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.name: hasLocalFile
Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.abstract: Indicates if the instance references and existing local file at fileURL

Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.name: pdfURL
Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.abstract: The URL for the PDF certificate file when locally stored.

Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.name: hasLocalPDF
Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.abstract: Indicates if the instance references and existing local certificate file at pdfURL

Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.name: dictionaryRepresentation()
Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.abstract: Returns a dictionary representation of the instance.

Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.name: merge(withFile:)
Structs/QEDFile.html#/s:6QEDSDK7QEDFileV.abstract: Returns a new QEDFile instance by merging the current instance with the provided file.
Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the value of the first argument is less than that of the second argument.
Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.

Structs/QEDFile.html.name: QEDFile
Structs/QEDFile.html.abstract: A QEDFile represents a data file locally stored on the user device that needs to be time stamped and notarised on the blockchain

Structs/QEDModel.html.name: QEDModel
Structs/QEDModel.html.abstract: QEDModel provides a set of helper methods to aid on persisting a data model ( represented as an array of QEDFile instances).

Protocols/QEDVideoPlayRecordViewControll.name: videoPlayRecordController(_:allowToDeleteFileAt:)
Protocols/QEDVideoPlayRecordViewControll.abstract: Asks the delegate if a local video file can be deleted.

Protocols/QEDVideoPlayRecordViewControll.name: videoPlayRecordController(_:fileDeletionRequestedFor:)
Protocols/QEDVideoPlayRecordViewControll.abstract: Tells the delegate a file deletion has been requested for a local file.

Protocols/QEDVideoPlayRecordViewControll.name: videoPlayRecordController(_:userRecordedFileAt:)
Protocols/QEDVideoPlayRecordViewControll.abstract: Tells the delegate the user has finished recording a new video

Protocols/QEDVideoPlayRecordViewControll.name: videoPlayRecordController(_:dismissalRequestWithNewRecordedFileAt:keepingFile:)
Protocols/QEDVideoPlayRecordViewControll.abstract: Tells the delegate the user has requested dismissal of the controller.

Protocols/QEDVideoPlayRecordViewControll.name: videoPlayRecordController(_:dismissalRequestDueTo:)
Protocols/QEDVideoPlayRecordViewControll.abstract: Tells the delegate the controller needs to be dismissed due to a setup error.

Protocols/QEDVideoPlayRecordViewControll.name: QEDVideoPlayRecordViewControllerDelegate
Protocols/QEDVideoPlayRecordViewControll.abstract: A class conforming to this protocol will receive the necessary method calls to handle the lifecycle for the video playback, recording and deletion from a QEDVideoPlayRecordViewController.

Classes/QEDVideoPlayRecordViewController.name: userNotAllowedToUseCamera
Classes/QEDVideoPlayRecordViewController.abstract: User has denied usage of the camera to the app. Need to be changed in Settings

Classes/QEDVideoPlayRecordViewController.name: errorSettingUpForRecording
Classes/QEDVideoPlayRecordViewController.abstract: A setup error due to HW availability or recording session setup.

Classes/QEDVideoPlayRecordViewController.name: SetupError
Classes/QEDVideoPlayRecordViewController.abstract: Represents an Error on the Setup process of the controller.

Classes/QEDAPI.html#/s:6QEDSDK6QEDAPIC13.name: ReportHandler
Classes/QEDAPI.html#/s:6QEDSDK6QEDAPIC13.abstract: The handler for report related requests made to QED REST API

Classes/QEDAPI.html#/s:6QEDSDK6QEDAPIC14.name: SuccessHandler
Classes/QEDAPI.html#/s:6QEDSDK6QEDAPIC14.abstract: The handler for requests made to QED REST API that return a success boolean.

Classes/QEDAPI.html#/s:6QEDSDK6QEDAPIC5s.name: setup(with:)
Classes/QEDAPI.html#/s:6QEDSDK6QEDAPIC5s.abstract: Will setup the QEDAPI shared instance with the required apiKey to make authenticated requests.

Classes/QEDAPI.html#/s:6QEDSDK6QEDAPIC10.name: sendReport(for:completion:)
Classes/QEDAPI.html#/s:6QEDSDK6QEDAPIC10.abstract: Will issue a request to the backend (for initial submission or updates if previously reported) for a notarizing report of the given file

Classes/QEDAPI.html#/s:6QEDSDK6QEDAPIC9g.name: getReport(for:completion:)
Classes/QEDAPI.html#/s:6QEDSDK6QEDAPIC9g.abstract: Will get the current report data for a given file from the backend.

Classes/QEDAPI.html#/s:6QEDSDK6QEDAPIC11.name: generatePDF(for:completion:)
Classes/QEDAPI.html#/s:6QEDSDK6QEDAPIC11.abstract: Will reqeust the generation and download of the PDF document for a given QEDFile instance.

Classes/QEDAPI.html.name: QEDAPI
Classes/QEDAPI.html.abstract: The QEDAPI provides a wrapper class on the QED REST API.

Classes/QEDVideoPlayRecordViewController.name: QEDVideoPlayRecordViewController
Classes/QEDVideoPlayRecordViewController.abstract: A View Controller providing record and playback video functionality for locally stored video files.
